document.title: 30 Symfony Best Practices, the slides from my talk at SymfonyDay Cologne '09
document.author: NiKo
document.text:
Hey there, its been a while, huh?
Today I gave a talk about Symfony best practices at the Symfony Day event in Cologne, Germany ; you can get the slides on slideshare or directly browse them below:
The Symfony Day event has been purely awesomely incredibly well organized, many kudos and thanks to Interlutions and to all the attendees. Youre all great people. Thanks.
